docs.title: Welcome to frd2vtu
docs.text: A Python tool to convert CalculiX .frd files to VTK .vtu files.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
frd2vtu converts CalculiX binary .frd files into VTK .vtu files, enabling visualization in tools like ParaView. It supports a variety of element types and can process multiple files in parallel using multiprocessing.

For more details, see the Installation, Usage, Examples, and API Reference.

docs.title: frd2vtu.frd2vtu(frd_files, parallel=True)
docs.text:
Convert one or more .frd files to .vtu format.

  • Args:
  • *frd_files (str): Paths to .frd files to convert.

  • parallel (bool): Use parallel processing (default: True).

  • Returns:

  • None

docs.title: frd2vtu.frdbin2vtu(file_path)
docs.text:
Convert a single binary .frd file to .vtu format.

  • Args:

  • file_path (str): Path to the input .frd file.

  • Returns:

  • pyvista.UnstructuredGrid if successful, None otherwise.

docs.title: frd2vtu.basic_plot.basic_plots(*vtu)
docs.text:
Create simple plots for the given .vtu files.

  • Args:

  • *vtu: Variable number of .vtu file paths.

  • Returns:

  • None (saves PNG files).

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
• Python >= 3.9.7
  • fire (^0.7.0)
  • pyvista (>=0.43.1, <=0.44.2)
  • vtk (^9.3.0)
  • pandas (^2.2.0)
  • numpy (>2.0.0)

These dependencies are automatically installed with the package.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: The frd2vtu tool provides a command-line interface to convert .frd files to .vtu format.

docs.title: Multiple Files
docs.text:
Convert multiple files at once (processed in parallel by default):

frd2vtu file1.frd file2.frd file3.frd

docs.title: Plotting
docs.text:
Generate basic plots from .vtu files:

frd2vtu_plot output.vtu

For more details, see the API Reference.
